Method Detail

train

public void train(InstancesContainer trainInstances,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> task_loss_params,
                  InstancesContainer developInstances,
                  int epoch,
                  int isAvg)
           throws java.lang.Exception
Train the model on the train instances

Parameters:
epoch - - the number of epochs to run over the data
trainInstances - - the training instances(train set)
task_loss_params - - the task loss parameters, if there are no parameters set this to null
developInstances - - the develop instances(dev set), set this to null if there is no validation set
isAvg - - an indicator whether or not to average the weights
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

predict

public java.util.ArrayList<PredictedLabels> predict(InstancesContainer instances,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> task_loss_params,
                                                    int numPredictions2Return)
predict based on the model and return the scores of the best matches

Parameters:
instances - - the test set
task_loss_params - - the parameters for the task loss function, set to null if there are no task loss parameters
numPredictions2Return - - the number of examples to return in the scores
Returns:
ArrayList - return the predicted labels as array

plotValidationError

public void plotValidationError(boolean save)
Plotting the error graph for the validation set

Parameters:
save - flag which indicates whether to write the image or not

saveModel

public void saveModel(java.lang.String path)
               throws java.io.IOException
save the model, notice: we save only the weight vector, the rest of the configuration should be predefined

Parameters:
path - - the path to save the model

java.io.IOException
